TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit RSACng extends System.Security.Cryptography.RSA
Public NotInheritable Class RSACng Inherits RSA
public ref class RSACng sealed : System::Security::Cryptography::RSA

summary.span: Provides a Cryptography Next Generation (CNG) implementation of the RSA algorithm.

span.span: Provides a Cryptography Next Generation (CNG) implementation of the RSA algorithm.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別衍生自類別。The class is derived from the class. 因此，它並不表示掉落對於現有的使用。Therefore, it is not a drop-in replacement for existing uses of . 使用類似的程式設計模型類別而非類別。 uses a programming model that is similar to the class rather than the class. 例如: For example: - 所使用的金鑰由個別管理物件。The key used by is managed by a separate object. 相反地，有直接繫結至的作業類型本身的索引鍵。In contrast, has a key that is directly tied to the operations of the type itself. - 執行這類作業簽章和使用的屬性來驗證簽章物件，就如同會使用它的物件屬性，以控制簽署和驗證作業。 performs such operations as signing and verifying signatures by using properties of the object, just as uses its object properties to control signing and verification operations. > [!NOTE] > 類別是使用 Windows CNG 程式庫的 RSA 演算法的實作，而且無法在非 Windows 作業系統上使用。The class is an implementation of the RSA algorithm using the Windows CNG libraries and isn't available on operating systems other than Windows. 針對還未執行 Windows interop 應用程式，您已建議您使用而不是直接參考此類型。For applications which aren't doing Windows interop, you're encouraged to use instead of referencing this type directly.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有效金鑰大小範圍從 384 到 16384 位元，以 8 為增量單位。Valid key sizes range from 384 to 16,384 bits, in increments of 8. 我們建議的 2048 位元的大小下限，用於所有索引鍵。We recommend that a minimum size of 2,048 bits be used for all keys.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 的`key`必須。The of `key` must be . 這個建構函式會建立金鑰的副本。This constructor creates a copy of the key. 即使`key`已處置，RSA 在此索引鍵物件的複本會保持運作。Even if `key` is disposed, the copy of this key object in RSA remains alive.

summary.span: Replaces the existing key that the current instance is working with by creating a new for the parameters structure.

span.span: Replaces the existing key that the current instance is working with by creating a new for the parameters structure.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`parameters`只有指數和模數，僅包含公開金鑰是匯入。If `parameters` contains only an exponent and modulus, only a public key is imported. 如果`parameters`也包含完整的索引鍵組會匯入 P 和 Q 值。If `parameters` also contains P and Q values, a full key pair is imported.

exception.span: contains neither an exponent nor a modulus.

span.span: contains neither an exponent nor a modulus.

member this.Key : System.Security.Cryptography.CngKey

summary.span: Gets the key that will be used by the object for any cryptographic operation that it performs.

span.span: Gets the key that will be used by the object for any cryptographic operation that it performs.
The key used by the object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 傳回物件已處置，如果索引鍵重設，例如藉由變更屬性，使用來建立新的金鑰，或透過處置的父代物件。The returned object is disposed if the key is reset, for instance by changing the property, by using the to create a new key, or by disposing of the parent object. 因此，您應該確定在這些情況下，不會再使用索引鍵物件。Therefore, you should ensure that the key object is no longer used in these cases. 這物件不是相同物件傳遞至建構函式，如果已使用該建構函式。This object is not the same as the object passed to the constructor, if that constructor was used. 不過，它會指向相同的 CNG 金鑰。However, it will point to the same CNG key.

permission.span: 用於與 unmanaged 程式碼的作業。

span.span: for operating with unmanaged code.
